products.name: Satin Gown
products.brandedName: ML Monique Lhuillier Satin Gown
products.description: Introducing the stunning ML Monique Lhuillier Satin Gown, a breathtaking addition to any wardrobe. This luxurious poppy red gown challenges the serious stereotype of luxury with its whimsical and playful designs. The cutout design and pleated detailing create a unique, eye-catching look that will turn heads at any event. The gown measures approximately 65 inches from shoulder to hem and features a center back zipper with hook-and-eye closure, making it easy to put on and take off. Crafted from 100% polyester, this dress should be dry cleaned only. The ML Monique Lhuillier Satin Gown is imported and comes in a range of sizes to fit every woman perfectly. Order now and prepare to make a stunning entrance at your next special occasion.

Launched in 2002, alice + olivia by Stacey Bendet is a sophisticated brand with a playful sensibility, which epitomizes the personality and style of its founder, Stacey Bendet. The brand was born from Stacey's personal quest to create a flattering pair of pants, and has since grown into a full womens ready to wear collection, including outerwear, dresses, and the perfect pants that started it all. Now a full lifestyle collection, the brand has become a Hollywood favorite with fans including Gwyneth Paltrow, Fergie, Anne Hathaway, Jennifer Lopez, Blake Lively, and Taylor Swift.

Lightweight ribbed knit fabric with lettuce trim. SDYS-WD160. SFD736. We want women to feel like they don't need permission to showcase their own style. For us, it's always going to be about promoting creativity without contingencies. Directors Melanie Purcell and Lauren Gocher named SNDYS after their favorite day of the week, Sunday, where they would spend time with family and discover new creative outlets. SNDYS offers cutting edge and affordable styles that not only follow trends, but start them. Based out of Sydney, Australia, SNDYS is bold and unabashedly feminine. Expect matching lounge sets, floral maxi dresses, and timeless outerwear.

Raised in Santa Fe, Ford made a name for himself as creative director at Gucci, where he transformed the house of fashion into a thriving 21st century brand before going on to launch his own wildly successful label in 2005. Today, Tom Ford is coveted for everything from its statement sunglasses and fine leather accessories to its glamorous dresses and impeccably tailored suits. A Tom Ford design is an exquisite balance of timelessness and modernity.

About the designer: Creative director since 2015, Demna Gvasalia continues Balenciaga’s tradition of extreme experimentation, bringing his uniquely subversive vision to the storied French house. Merging the worlds of streetwear and high fashion, and blatantly disregarding industry conventions, Gvasalia reconfigures the label’s archival pieces with signature exaggerated silhouettes, asymmetric cuts, and acid colorways. Androgynous blazers, trench coats, and wool overcoats are cut in oversized shapes, while t-shirts, hoodies, and knitwear feature signature logo graphics.

products.name: Gardenia-Embroidered Tweed Jacket
products.brandedName: Oscar de la Renta Gardenia-Embroidered Tweed Jacket
products.description: The Oscar de la Renta Resort '24 collection embodies the excitement of winter’s seasonal shift to spring, when wildlife reappears and blooms reemerge to paint the city in color again. Through a color story of vibrant hues and bold prints, Co-Creative Directors Laura Kim and Fernando Garcia enliven elegant silhouettes, polished tailoring and sophisticated design techniques.Tailored from fringed tweed, this jacket is covered with gardenia-patterned guipure-lace. It lends a polished finish to everything from jeans and a tee to neatly tailored separates.
